posting_body: ['All About the Details', 'Perfectly situated on Mission Boulevard, SoHay is close to everything that makes Hayward a perfect place to call home.', 'Our brand new, boastingly spacious apartment homes are tucked away yet super close to Cal State East Bay, major tech employers, and everything else the Bay area has to offer.', 'Follow the Flow and Make your way to SoHay.', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 575 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- In home washer/dryer*', '- Walk-in closets*', '- Mountain views*', '- Kitchen islands*', '- Glass top ranges', '- Wood style flooring', '- Chic quartz countertops', '*', 'In Select Units Only', 'Community Amenities', '- Bike storage', '- Secured parking', '- Inviting community courtyard', '- Welcoming community park', '- Ground-level retail', '- Convenient package lockers', '- Curated resident programming', 'The Mix at SoHay', '29213 Mission Blvd, Hayward, CA, 94544', 'f0yL0Odf']
